title: Project Rainbow Jersey: Tadej Pogačar Sets Sights on World Title in 2024
content:
The big animator of this year’s worlds looks to trade bronze for gold next time out, and rules out big push for Olympic Games in 2024.

Read the full article at Project Rainbow Jersey: Tadej Pogačar Sets Sights on World Title in 2024 on Velo.
author: sstokes
